Services

“We specialize in traditional PR and new media, organization of business and BTL events, execution of IT-projects in the field of communications. Team of professionals enables us to realize any kind of a project. Quality Management System guarantees effectiveness of our work. Our clients entrust us their reputation and they never regret this decision.”
Get in Touch

Event management

Congresses, conferences, exhibitions and BTL events

Polylog acts as one of the largest forum operators in Russia. So far we have organized more than 150 conferences, round tables, exhibitions, and forums.

More

Public Relations

You will get into the public eye and promote your idea

Polylog Consulting Group specializes in complex PR-support of events, brands and experts. Most of our clients come back to us with a demand for extended services.

More

Fundraising

Raising funds for your events and other large scale projects

We help to accumulate resources for different projects — both commercial and non-profit, with seed capital and without, for one-time and long-term projects. We offer sponsorship integrations, ticket services etc.

More

Analytics and advent of technology
for public institutions

R&D Department conducts all types of research to optimize and automate business processes for our clients in accordance with the law of Russia. We develop web-sites and complex IT-solutions for our clients.
